edu.illinois.i3.htrc.registry.api.workset

Interface PublicVolumesAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PublicVolumesAPIImpl

    @Produces(value={"application/vnd.htrc-volume+xml","application/vnd.htrc-volume+json","application/xml","application/json"})
public interface PublicVolumesAPI
    JAX-RS API Interface for accessing workset volumes of public worksets
    Author:
    capitanu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getVolumes(String author)
      GET: Retrieve the workset volumes as XML or JSON
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getVolumesAsCSV(String author)
      GET: Retrieve workset volumes as CSV
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getVolumesAsPlainText(String author)
      GET: Retrieve workset volumes as plain-text
